Text:

Great band. I just saw them in Louisville. BTW you got 'The Rising Tide' and 'Suspended by the Throat' mixed up. I am seeding.

Doom was a pretty good album, but this is honestly the worst band I have ever seen live. They just can't play what they put on the album and make it sound the same. Bands need to not record shit that they can't play live.

Other then their live show, great band.
the metal scene in the usa is pretty weak, it needs all the support it can get.  please, send these guys some money for downloading their stuff - show support.
